text: Romani people in Hungary (also known as Hungarian Roma or Romani Hungarians or Hungarian Gypsy; or magyar cig√°nyok) are Hungarian citizens who are of Romani descent. According to the 2011 census, they make up 3.18% of the total population in Hungary, which makes them the largest minority in the country, various estimations have put the number of Romani people as high as 12% of the total population. ==References== Hungary Category:Ethnic groups in Hungary
title: Romani people in Hungary
